Dialogue: The shops keep all their gold unguarded. I could sneak in and steal some for you. But I need some gold as insurance.
Looks like your faith in me has paid off. Have at the riches!
I was spotted by some guards and ran away. We'll get it next time
There's a theif in town. He's been talking about stealing from the shops. I think he has the know how to pull it off.
There's a theif in town. He's been talking about stealing from the shops. Don't think about throwing in with him. I can hear him from a mile away.
I've said my piece.
COME ONE COME ALL TO THE DANGEROUS AND CHANCY GAME OF FLAMEBALL! THE GAME IS DEADLY, DANGEROUS AND CAN WIN YOU ALOT OF GOLD!
WOW! YOU ACTUALLY SURVIVED..... here's the prize.
OUCH! AND ANOTHER ONE DIED IN THE FICKLE GAME OF FLAMEBALL!
Games over and my voice hurts, leave.
Hey. I'm a bard that plays for the tournament crowds. If you were to give me some money I'd be willing to sing your praises to the captivating crowd.
They loved my performance. Hope it helps you in the fight.
They... didn't like my performance at all. I really need to start actually practicing my music.
I hear there's a bard around here willing to sing your praises to the crowd. I've heard he's pretty good.
There's a bard around here willing to sing your praises to the crowd. I wouldn't waste your time, he's not any good.
Look I've done all I can just leave me alone
I'm a travelling trainer. I train the best fighters in all the land. I can train them in everything I know.
You're now stronger than before. I hope you take my teaching to the fields of battle.
I CAN'T DEAL WITH STUDENTS WHO CAN'T PAY ATTENTION FOR FIVE MINUTES WITHOUT TRYING TO WHACK EACH OTHER WITH A SWORD!
There's a travelling battlemaster in town. I've heard he's very patient with new students.
There's a travelling battlemaster in town. I've heard he's not very good with students.
I'm an apothecary. I can slip the opposing team some medicine to make them drowsy.
They all drank the medicine. Hope that helps in the upcoming fight.
They caught me, I couldn't do it.
There's an apothecary in town. Heard he's good at making people feel drowsy.
There's an apothecary in town. Heard he's a charlatan.
